About Me

Building the future,
one project at a time

I'm a first-year Computer Science student at Saddleback College with a passion for building impactful software. From prediction market tools to robotics, I love tackling complex problems with friendly solutions.

When I'm not on the grind, you'll find me snowboarding, eating udon, or playing poker with friends.
